messages.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
messages.deleteAccountConfirm: Deleting your account will remove all data. Are you sure?
messages.deleteAccountSuccessMessage:
Your account has been successfully deleted.
Thank you for using our service.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.initialWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.dataWarning: Your data will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
deleteAccount.emailConfirmPrompt: Please enter your email address for account security.
deleteAccount.emailMismatch: The email address does not match.
deleteAccount.finalDataWarning: Deleting your account will immediately delete all personal data and cannot be recovered.
deleteAccount.deleteError: An error occurred during account deletion.
deleteAccount.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
